name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of creative writing, including the study of literary genres such as poetry, fiction, and drama.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: This course is a creative writing workshop for students who have already taken Introduction to Creative Writing. The course focuses on the craft of writing, with an emphasis on revision and experimentation.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: This course covers advanced topics in creative writing, such as writing for specific audiences, the development of personal writing style, and the use of literary devices. It also includes a focus on the business and culture of writing.
